website_summaries.verdict: An affordable, classic coffee maker by a popular British brand that comes with some nice features and a few flaws.
pros: Sports a coffee ground soaking shower head that produces delicious brews
Has a built-in filter but can also be used with paper filters
cons: Some machines quit working after a few months

customer_reviews.title: An excellent, compact unit that's lasted 2 years so far.
customer_reviews.text: An excellent compact unit that's used several times a day and has lasted 2 years so far. I use filtered water & paper filters for easy cleaning. I use the clean function every 3-6 months. I usually reset the machine after 40 mins to keep the coffee warm for up to 90 mins. I've seen negative reviews about durability but providing you are careful with the carafe and lid, it should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee machine for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product approximately 2 months ago as I was fed up dealing with coffee grinds from cleaning out my french press. The machine is extremely simple to use and clean. I use coffee filters in the machine and find this is easiest for cleaning. The coffee tastes great and I love the functions that allow you to brew smaller portions with the same strength of coffee. I use the timer function daily and it is great to wake up to a brewed coffee before I head off to work. Would fully recommend, great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back in Feb it is now August. This machine has probably been one of the best purchases this year. Great machine! I have it set to brew 10 minutes before I leave for work so I can make a coffee to go. Coffee tastes great from it and it comes out at a good temperature. Doesn't take long to brew 4-6 cups. We do use coffee filters even though there is no need to. But it makes cleaning 10x faster. You just throw the ground away.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Alford

customer_reviews.title: Taste of plastic during the whole first week of purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Although I know Russell Hobbs to be a very good company, I was disappointed when after a whole week the coffee still smelled and worse, tasted of plastic. Used different kind of waters, tap and bottled, cleaned the filter and descaled it although this should not have to occur before at least a month (?). Reading the reviews (unfortunately after the problem) I discovered that other clients had had the same problem. Thus, what happened to that particular device?
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Alfonso Van Delsen

customer_reviews.title: Updated Review
customer_reviews.text: Had to update my previous bad review which I hope didn't make it here. I'm embarrassed to say that I have too many kitchen gadgets in the one corner and plugging in the toaster by mistake does not make this coffee maker work. Idiotic I know but nothing new. Apologies to Russell Hobbs. Glad I didn't send it back, it makes a fine coffee and I'd recommend this to anyone as well as their other products I own.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: At first this seemed like a good buy. After three months I have decided it is not fit for purpose. I have to clean the machine every week as the machine clogs up, the water overheats and evaporates and there is a strong smell of plastic. My return date to Amazon has expired. RH's help site says to contact the original seller. Zero stars to RH for their lack of support. They seem to sell a faulty product and are not willing to acknowledge their failings. Not a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs B.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I was originally happy with my purchase but after 4 months it is leaking water from the bottom of the machine. This seems to be a common problem.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Wells

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Despite all the negative comments on here, I've found this excellent. No background plastic flavour, functions perfectly and the coffee is hot. The only negative thing is that you can't leave it on for hours as it switches itself off after about 40 mins, but I knew that before I bought it. If I wanted it to stay hot and put it on the dining table (after as meal) I can use a candle driven warming plate, which works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Fredrik Nath (author)

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last a 12 month.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this coffee machine in April 2016. Was used once a day, and after seven months it stopped working, and water would not rise up through the filter
customer_reviews.author: Ghstguy

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 6 months
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for about 3-4 months, then became ridiculously slow - I used to put it on while i made some toast in the mornings and it would be done but now had to sit down for 15 minutes and wait for it to brew. This got progressively worse until about 6 months after purchase it stopped drawing water up all together, it just stayed in the water resevoir. The machine was regularly descaled and i tried to do so again with no success. I bought this to replace a morphy richards one that lasted 6 years without an issue - I won't be returning to russel hobbs. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kieran

customer_reviews.title: Good machine though they don't last
customer_reviews.text: This is my second machine of this particular model. Unfortunately the previous one only lasted about 18 months (used on average once per day). But overall it's the best coffee machine I've ever had, and cheap enough to replace, which is why I've bought another the same. My only real criticism is that if the power is interrupted for more than a few seconds, it loses both the time and the timer setting. A battery backup would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Simply Fantastic :)
customer_reviews.text: So far I am really impressed with this coffee filter machine. No horrid plastic tastes! I used a Starbucks house blend of coffee and it tastes just as if I was in Starbucks it's self. I'm these times I am glad I could get hold of this coffee because due to the current covid-19 crisis I won't be visiting any coffee shop and time soon!
customer_reviews.author: Lee Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect coffee machine
customer_reviews.text: Coffee from this machine tastes great . Timer function works perfect. Very easy to clean, reasonable quick, good access to filling the reservoir. The only downside is, it's really hard to lift the lid with just one hand. Perfect idea is dedicated place for scoop. Plastic smell lasts for 2-3 runs of water, but if you read instructions, they advised run it several times to get rid of plastic smell. And finally, it looks perfect in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Roman Stehlik

customer_reviews.title: good coffee machine for a very reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my farther, it’s a well made product. But I haven't give 5 stars for a couple of reasons: first, the power cable is short! Not a major problem but a little inconvenient. The instruction manual is not the easiest to understand, programming the machine to start at specific time, You will figure it out but it took me a few goes. Still a very good coffee machine for a very reasonable price so I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Magee

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift as reviews were really good. Looks great and works well except the jug ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift as reviews were really good. Looks great and works well except the jug cracked on first use making it unusable.I don't seem to be able to contact Amazon to request a replacement Jug, everything is automated and no facility to explain the problem. This would put me off buying from here again and the after purchase service is poor and not very customer friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Bex18

customer_reviews.title: Leaking hot water after two months
customer_reviews.text: Just like many other customers the machine stops working after two months of normal use. It’s leaking water from the bottom as soon as switched on. I want to contact the seller but there is no option!
customer_reviews.author: Mariano Latorre

customer_reviews.title: Very nice machine!
customer_reviews.text: I am a bit late with this review. This coffee-machine is very good and lovely when you switch on this nice bleu ring lights up at the bottem and also the onn switch gives a bleu light. Good you can use coffee filters so easy to clean. Before I had a machine who also did grind the beans, after a while became very noisy and difficult cleaning. So very pleased with this coffee machine. Thanks Diete
customer_reviews.author: Minette

customer_reviews.title: Short-Lived
customer_reviews.text: When it worked it was very good - quality coffee and stayed hot. However it has only lasted FIVE MONTHS before water started leaking / pouring out through the bottom of the reservoir and the entire contents ended up on the worktop, down the cupboards, in the drawers. Silly me - I hadn't realised that I couldn't leave it on its own to do its thing! This is a shame as RH products are generally very good. Can't recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sidney

customer_reviews.title: Good machine and settings, makes good coffee.. and good price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works well, can't complain - decent price and makes good coffee We usually set it for 1-4 cups (there's a button for that) and we love that there's an automatic timer so we wake up in the morning for work and our pot of coffee is all ready and fresh!! Nice enough design and not too big, so looks good in the kitchen
customer_reviews.author: J. Rey

customer_reviews.title: as such requires double the amount of coffee grounds to create a good cup of coffee
customer_reviews.text: Works far too fast, as such requires double the amount of coffee grounds to create a good cup of coffee, compared to other FC machines I have owned in the past, Morphy Richards etc. I use daily so this will cost me a fortune in coffee. Returning. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still the best
customer_reviews.text: Our previous coffee maker of exactly this same model died after just over 4 years of daily use. So I looked around for something better. But this is still the best balance of price, features, quality and - most important - taste. Not having tried other coffee makers for some time I can't definitively say it makes the best tasting coffee, but I can say it's excellent - clean and full flavoured. One star dropped because the previous machine lasted less than five years.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Return as faulty with out box
customer_reviews.text: I’m absolutely disgusted in the product it is simply cheap I opened it with full excitement Russell and hobs is a great make but it doesn’t make a wam coffee I have no box but I’m asking you if I can return the item as I’m so disappointed and money is extremely hard for me with regards John Harris
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the price. Hadn’t had a coffee maker for a few years . Easy to use and clean, quick to make coffee. Took us a couple of times to get it just right but now use 2 scoops of coffee for 4 cups if water just right for us. Sits on work top and doesn’t use too much space up. Impressed with purchase would buy again and have recommended to family.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn B.

customer_reviews.title: Would have been 5
customer_reviews.text: As much as I love my new coffee maker, it's easy to use and very quick to delivery lovely coffee, it's the fact it turns off after about 40mins. I understand why, to stop the flavour being ruined, but it's still a nuisance and there should be a way to leave the hotplate on until turned off manually. That said, it's still a great coffee machine.
customer_reviews.author: Su Dickens

customer_reviews.title: One of my favourite purchases
customer_reviews.text: Zero problems with this machine. Does exactly what its supposed to do. Has a filter that you can easily clean, so no need for the paper filters (although I use them also through habit). Keeps your coffee hot for 45 mins, then auto switches off. Timer and clock so that you can set your coffee the night before so you wake to fresh coffee. A bargain price - would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Such great coffee again
customer_reviews.text: My old RH Coffee machine packed up, I saved the jug, bought two other makes both had to be returned so I had to go back to this one and I had forgotten how fantastic the coffee is, perfect every time, I will never ever use another machine, please Russell Hobbs never stop making this one.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Really a great coffee maker.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great coffee maker. It seems to be faster that it's predecessor which is a bonus. It's become my first choice for making a couple of cups of coffee at the same time. It doesn't use paper filters even though the instruction booklet says it does. Another bonus. It also has a 1-4 cups button to make it produce stronger coffee when making less that 5 cups at once.
customer_reviews.author: W H Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for coffee lover!
customer_reviews.text: Great brew from it and no coffee grind ending up on the pot or my cup unlike a French press... great with coffee ground to any strength... 5 mins gets you a pot. Need to wait until it cools down to clean it as condensation is notable. Cleans well with 5 mins work! Hot plate is awesome too!
customer_reviews.author: John Mulhall

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant coffee maker just set the timer the night before ...
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant coffee maker just set the timer the night before and wake up to the amazing aroma of coffee waiting for you in the morning. Easy to clean all round top bit of kit.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Timer function is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Coffee is coffee, the maker is of less importance than the bean. The most annoying thing about this product - and it is enough to make me regret buying it - is that it turns itself off after fortyfive minutes. I don't drink a pot of coffee in that time, so i have to keep remembering to turn it off and then back on again. Poor design for one person, probably all right for an office.
customer_reviews.author: Elsie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, easy to use, set up and clean
customer_reviews.text: Great machine, I would recommend buying the extra filters to pop in the machine when making coffee, makes it easier to clean after daily use of throwing away old coffee. Easy to clean and great all round machine. Timer must be set every time after putting in new coffee and water. Keeps coffee warm for 30-40 minutes after brewed. No longer which is fine as the coffee would burn.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: coffee
customer_reviews.text: why o why do electrical gadgets never have a back up battery for the clock , faffed about with button pressing to set clock and we had a power cut that night, so did it again then my electrics tripped out (could have been the water element but not tripped again since) Clock now is correct twice a day at 12,00 so timer feature never used. Good value and works well, does make spitting sound at first a little worrying, now used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Whosphoto

customer_reviews.title: Decent coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: Been using this daily for over a month now, and very happy with it. Looks smart and is neatly designed so is quite compact and takes up less counter space compared to our previous machine. Works fine, love the timer function, makes decent coffee. Only niggle is that the hotplate function switches off after 30-45 minutes - our old one stayed on for an hour, which we preferred. The glass jug spout feels quite thin, like it might break easily if knocked against anything but so far no problems. Overall we are very happy with it and glad we didn't splash out on a more expensive machine.
customer_reviews.author: ordinaryJude

customer_reviews.title: Look a little further,sadly.
customer_reviews.text: I've only just bought this but sadly will be buying a different one. The keep warm function is an issue,for me it lasts 30 minutes and if you read other comments you find 30-1 hr which is worrying they all vary given it's the same make and model. 30 minutes is way too early for a cut off time and defeats the object of buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Jane

customer_reviews.title: Coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a present, reviewing it as can't find another way of getting it out of my review list. Recipient naturally said they loved it ;)
customer_reviews.author: Paula Graham

customer_reviews.title: 40 minute keep warm time.
customer_reviews.text: As far as I can see nowhere in the description does it stipulate that the keep warm function only operates for 40 minutes. You can press the start button to extend it but only if you notice the indicator light is flashing! Purchased this model because other machine descriptors mentioned a 40 minute limit. edit 25/04/2020 have reduced this to two stars because like others have reported the machine started to leak from the base once it started to heat up. Full refund by Amazon though under warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Don't forget to register for a free, extended 1year warranty on top of your 2 year guarantee
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had done this for my old one which finally died after 2yrs and 7 months yesterday! I would say I made a minimum of 2 brews a day, every day of its life. I did not hesitate to buy another one. Great, fast, coffee filter machine which gets every ounce of flavour out of the ground coffee you use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely quality and easy to use (not auto though)
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and user friendly. would rather it was a little easier to clean as shows all the water marks immediately. Cannot work out how to set up automatically to come on however many times I try it, neither could a savvy tech in family get it to come on automatically so if it is meant to be easy maybe it's faulty?
customer_reviews.author: Sarah P

customer_reviews.title: WORTH THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy I bought this coffee machine as its not only stylish but makes a great coffee. The timer is great and I now wake up to my coffee already to just pour. You don't need a filter as it has one plus carafe and filter is replaceable when needed. I would highly recommend for the coffee fans 😁
customer_reviews.author: Icequeen

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee maker and doesn't take up too much space.
customer_reviews.text: My partner loves his coffee and thought it about time I buy a machine for him for one of his birthday gifts. After lots of research I went with this one and I'm so glad I did. Easy to use, hot plate keeps the coffee hot but not burnt, and the timer function is life changing! My partner works nights so sets the timer when he gets home and the coffee is waiting for him when he gets up. For the filter we do use filter papers as it makes it easier to clean. Highly recommend this machine.
customer_reviews.author: lars

customer_reviews.title: BEST EVER FILTER COFFEE MAKER!
customer_reviews.text: The most important requirement is the ability to brew delicious coffee and this Russell Hobbs excels. It's also easy to clean and fill. I've had some very expensive filter coffee makers over the years and this beats them all on every level and all for less than £50! An absolute bargain find!
customer_reviews.author: Alan Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee
customer_reviews.text: Good offee maker and really fast. The timer is really easy to use and really helpful. Good quality of coffee and easy to clean. The only disadvantage is that the coffee is automatically switched off after 15 minutes so the coffee in the jar starts getting cold. Other coffee machines are staying on until you press the OFF button and this helps preserve the coffe in the jar hot.
customer_reviews.author: IOANNIS DELIANDREOU

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than 6 months - poor inferior design and inferior brew.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this just before Christmas 2019, I thought Russell Hobbs was a good brand. Used it roughly once a week, then daily for the last six weeks until that is the water started leaking straight through the bottom of the machine mid May 2020. Setting the machine up for 4 cups it just emptied across the work surface before it could brew one cup. I used 5 flat scoops of coffee, the coffee was ok but not strong how I like it. I have now gone back to using an old coffee machine, and am using less coffee for a stronger brew. Needles to say - I won't be buying a Russell Hobbs machine again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Jones

customer_reviews.title: why did i wait?
customer_reviews.text: there are probably better models on the market, more expensive, i don't have them, i have this 1 and i find it more usable than the cafeteria i used for the last 6 years, timer function works but on the whole i don't bother with that, i set it up and push 1 button when i need to, hot plate is useful (would love it to stay on longer)(i use a pint mug) measuring spoon that comes with helps also, i wish i bought something like this years ago
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous be aware!
customer_reviews.text: Be aware,do not buy this!!! After six months of every day using i tried to make a coffee and the machine start to leak from the bottom with the power on. Thanks God i was fast enough to turn off the power otherwise a tragedy could have happened. PS. This coffee maker should be removed from Amazon site
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Harabagiu

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy!
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a few weeks now and it works as it should. The only conundrum is with the level markings which show a cup and a mug. Six cups equals four mugs. Not sure what mugs Russell Hobbs use but they must be small. The four mug level makes two mugs of a "normal" size - not the larger half pint variety. The amount of coffee has to be adjusted accordingly which is all a matter of personal taste. Coincidently we have a Russell Hobbs glass kettle which also has the rather fetching blue lighting effect so all in all they both give a very pleasant and "upmarket" light show!
customer_reviews.author: CaptainT

customer_reviews.title: Simply brilliant
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't live without this machine now! I set it up every evening using the timer so when I get up I can fill my flask and take fresh coffee to work... It's wonderful. One piece of advice I would give is to use paper filters, it does come with a filter but it's a bit of a faff cleaning this after every use.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Husband broke jug
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee machine I now have two, my husband dropped the jug of this first one tried to buy replacement jug it was eighteen pounds but a new machine complete with jug cost twenty eight pounds so it was a no brainer so I now have two machines but only one jug but great coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bit of kit
customer_reviews.text: I love strong coffee, if you are making 4-5 cups of coffee, you press a button and it slows down the brewing process to ensure those cups are full of flavour. If you prefer stronger coffee, you press that button regardless of the number of cups you are making and it will be awesome. The delayed time start means you can wake up to a fresh pot of coffee in the morning. Only negative I can think of is the heat plate only stays on for 40mins or so. There may be a way to keep it on for longer but I rarely make a full pot so I've never bothered to find out.
customer_reviews.author: M K O'Leary

customer_reviews.title: Good but don’t use the plastic filter it comes with!
customer_reviews.text: We like using this coffee machine but it took some time to experiment with different coffees and filters. We ended up just getting paper filters as the plastic one it comes with made the coffee taste weird. The filter size is 4 if anyone needs to get them for this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Eva S.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little coffee pot for the price. It makes good coffee and holds enough for three large cups of coffee. The warming plate doesn’t keep it warm long but it comes out nice and hot. It’s not the best but for the price it’s very good. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: PatriotEd

customer_reviews.title: Bought December 2019, stopped working June 2020
customer_reviews.text: A really nice looking coffee maker. We bought it in December last year and used it once a day . It made really good coffee, was easy to use and clean - we were very pleased. In June 2020 it stopped working, so considering the number of times used it was very poor value, lasting less than a year. I would not recommend it and should have taken the one and two star comments more seriously, but with so many good comments I ignored the warnings. Having recovered from the experience we are now thinking of getting another coffee machine - just not this one!
customer_reviews.author: Watty

customer_reviews.title: Proper coffee
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I purchased this. It’s very quick to make coffee and the timer is a good thing. My only moan about this is it that it doesn’t stay warm for long but I just put it in microwave for 30 secs but I do recommend it for a proper coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says on the box makes a good coffee, would like the hot plate to stay ...
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says on the box makes a good coffee, would like the hot plate to stay on a little longer but that is a minor issue. Love waking and getting up in the morning to fresh coffee using the timer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good deal
customer_reviews.text: Cheap. Easy to use, clean and looks nice on the kitchen worktop. There were no manufacture smells, so I quickly started to use it. Turns itself off after 40 mins., which is important for me. The marks on the jug and reservoir do not exactly fit each other, but it is not a big deal. The button to enhance brewing is not very useful since, to be honest, it doesn't seem to do anything.
customer_reviews.author: CihanD

customer_reviews.title: Leaky reservoir massive mess
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd of these coffee machines to have developed a leak from the water resovoir rendering the machine useless. We bought it in July last year, and although it brews great coffee, it is not worth the aggro of not having my morning coffee. These parts can ot be repaired or replaced. Trying to contact the manufacturer for a resolution
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Not a good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Has left a very plastics smell / taste for a long time. Not obvious whether buttons are on on or off position. Not a good quality product. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Coffee Maker
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for the same model purchased just over two years ago. The older model intermittently started steaming up the room and produced only half the amount of coffee. All Russell Hobbs could offer was a 40% discount on a new coffee maker which would still be more expensive than Amazon's price. 0/10 for Russell Hobbs Customer Service.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Crumlish

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: I just love this machine, have it 2 months almost and i make everyday over 1l coffee. Coffee is ready fast and it keeps it warm till some point that turn off automatically.Very good quality especially for the price point and looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Vagelis Simitsis

customer_reviews.title: Great bit of kit
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this coffee machine. I just would have liked it to stay on a bit longer. Having said that, its a great bit of kit and very easy to keep clean etc. I use filters although you don't have to. Ok so I have now lived with this machine for a year and I have to say it is brilliant. It stays hot for long enough contrary to what I said earlier. It makes a great cup of coffee time after time
customer_reviews.author: Len Rowley

customer_reviews.title: Very short life for coffee machine
customer_reviews.text: Third machine in two years. Breakdown generally involves mountains of steam and next to no coffee filtered into pot. Having said that when it does work - which is not necessarily for long, it does make nice coffee . Strangely this time Amazon deny having supplied it and decline a refund. Bizarre. Sadly I have to say it is a rubbish product.
customer_reviews.author: Alan B Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee machine! The constitution feels stable unlike other coffee machines and the design looks nice. I like the blue horizontal light that lets me know for how long my coffee is warm. Easy to wash. I am not an expert in coffee taste but I only use the filter of the machine and the taste is good.
customer_reviews.author: georgina

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine
customer_reviews.text: This machine has many good features. It is quick to brew, easy to clean and produces a really lovely cup of coffee. The jug pours well and it is quite quiet, although the sound of coffee brewing is very comforting. The only grumble I have is that ir is a little top heavy and difficult to open. Apart from that it is a lovely machine and easy to take upstairs for morning coffee in bed.... luxury!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: Great everyday coffee maker. Is easy to operate and did not really need to resort to reading the instructions. Like the illuminations. Most importantly can quit drinking instant coffee at home, there is simply no comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Has started switching itself off...........
customer_reviews.text: This pot was great for the first few weeks, easy to use, nice to look at on my worktop, lovely hot coffee BUT of course now after my return date it has started randomly switching itself off, meaning either no coffee or cold coffee!!! Not sure if I can send it back at this stage?!?! Not happy.... 😬
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Dyvonne Harris

customer_reviews.title: Shame it shuts off
customer_reviews.text: Makes decent coffee - obviously the ground coffee has to be high quality to start with - but annoying that the machine shuts down after 40 mins. why do manufacturers think this is necessary? Some of us like to keep going back for another cup. If it didn't do this it would get 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Renka

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Great present for my boyfriend! Coffee tastes perfect for him and he’s able to make it as strong as he wants (and he likes it very very strong!) The timer option is fab, and means neither of us have to bother with the cafeteria first thing in the morning! Great buy. I looked for days at many products on many websites and this one is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Katieb

customer_reviews.title: Great value and great tasting coffee
customer_reviews.text: I like coffee. This machine is really easy to use. Great value. The coffee taste nice once you get used to how much coffee to put it. I would advise a few run throughs with no coffee in to get the machine clean. First few I did had a horrid plastic taste. It was fine after the 4th attempt.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: Served it's Purpose
customer_reviews.text: The machine is easy to use, easy to clean and looks neat on the counter top. Unfortunately it doesn't brew particularly hot, if you add milk to your drink it's tepid. The best way to get a nice hot brew is either to fill with hot water or leave on the hotplate for a while before drinking. Also one of the hinges on the pot lid broke quite soon after purchase, still usable but just have to be a bit careful when pouring. It's served its purpose but after just 8 months light usage we will need to buy a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Cheap. Came already assembled. Easy enough instructions. Also has a washable filter which seems to work flawlessly with no particles in my coffee. Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I've had this a year now and it's worked flawlessly. I use paper filters just because I am skeptical of the built-in filter, but other reviewers say it's fine. My only bug bear is that you can't easily see whether the timer is engaged or not - you have to bend down to see a small indicator at the top of the display, which is otherwise hidden by the surround. A separate light would be much better.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this item!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this coffee machine at the beginning of January and it worked great until now. Less than 4 months after I've purchased the item, it has started leaking from the bottom. The coffee machine hasn't been moved from the kitchen counter placement since I've bought it, apart from a clean and it doesn't have any other items around it that can be knocked into it. This item is faulty and unless you want a coffee machine for less than 4 months, I'd choose another option.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Stuck

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says on the tin!
customer_reviews.text: Coffee tastes great, but timer is too short to keep coffee hot. But this seems to be inline with current health and safety guidelines. The best things are the taste of the coffee and how it looks, it matches my kettle too! The worst thing about machine is the instructions! I can’t get the auto timer to work! My last machine was so straight forward but this seems to flummox me!!
customer_reviews.author: amanda evans

customer_reviews.title: Happy birthday boy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad and he loves it the filter change and removal is easy, cleaning is simple and easy and coffee is great! Nice to have a machine that isn't a faff to clean and used so you can actually use it everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Pamplin

customer_reviews.title: Stoped working after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I have had this coffee machine for about 2 months now and it has stopped working properly. I have completed cleaning the machine as per the manufactures instructions and this has not helped. It would appear that the water isn't flowing properly through the system causing the water in the reservoir to boil and evaporate into the kitchen rather than through the coffee grounds. I know this is only a £30 machine but I would have expected at least 12 months use from it rather than 2.
customer_reviews.author: NICHOLAS PARKER

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last!
customer_reviews.text: This machine was used once a day or less for only fourteen months before failing. Water now emerges from under the hotplate whenever the reservoir has water in it. This occurs even if the machine is not switched on and would empty the reservoir if left for long enough. It worked well enough while it lasted but the fact that the anti drip arrangement at the base of the filter funnel is on the removable funnel and not on the housing meant the cut-off was less than positive and the seating of the funnel somewhat wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: Catriona Flora Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Not instant but very quick
customer_reviews.text: Machine delivers hot coffee efficiently - flavour depends on beans used. Non drip feature very effective. Keeps coffee at drinkable heat. Copes with 4-6 cups but is obviously designed for larger quantities.
customer_reviews.author: Rev

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly top quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this coffee make 2 years ago and it has served me well at work used once a day for 5 days a week. After a short time the descaling function stopped doing what it should and today 2 years and 4 days after buying it, it is no longer working. Reading other reviews it seems that I've been luckier than many in that theirs didn't even last that long, do we really live in a world where something as simple as a coffee machine can't be built to last many years?
customer_reviews.author: "peteandgill3"

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: Well had this just over a month now and to me and the second half (the boss) the coffee is spot on great taste cannot understand why people on here says it doesnt try it yourself it wont disapoint.
customer_reviews.author: M. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great but not
customer_reviews.text: So this is a great machine on one hand for making a strong coffee.. However it never makes ta full pot, there is a huge amount of water lost in the steaming.. I presume its new function produces this. If you don't want fast coffee, or if you like strong coffee and are happy to take time to work out how to make the pot of coffee to suit you then this is treat but if your after a pot of quick filter coffee buy a different machine...
customer_reviews.author: Sday

customer_reviews.title: it does not make proper coffee
customer_reviews.text: i purchased two of this coffee maker and none of them brew coffee properly as the aroma and taste are very different. it does not taste real coffee despite the fact that i always use same brand of coffee for years. this is the worst coffee maker regarding the coffee taste. just waste of money. avoid this coffee maker. i am now searching different one. as a third
customer_reviews.author: D .A

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and cheerful, works really well.
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee machine! It’s cheap, simple, easy to use and clean. If you find your coffee doesn’t brew strong enough you need to buy a stronger coffee. The one downside is the hot plate only stays on for 40 minutes thanks to new EU energy regulations, so it’s not a fault that I can blame the manufacturer for as every coffee machine you would buy now is restricted to the same hot plate time limitations. Clean up is made much easier by using size 4 paper filters.
customer_reviews.author: Steph Harrion

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well.
customer_reviews.text: It does everything I require of it, it is easy to use and clean. I recommend the use of paper filters to make cleaning very simple. Also I would like to say that Aldi’s Colombian coffee is superb!
customer_reviews.author: Spook

customer_reviews.title: COV19 Survival kit
customer_reviews.text: Well unboxed it and got it set up, nice and easy to program. Got the timer function set up and ran hot water through twice to clear any dust and remove plastic taste. All that i needed in the coffee machine, hot plate keeps it hot, not 80's cop movie warm. Coffee taste great
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ke Moitt

customer_reviews.title: Compact and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: A very nice product and more compact than the model it replaced. I have no idea why Amazon constantly ask for a star rating on "durability". Hopefully, it will last me 10 years before I'll be able to answer that question. So please ignore the compulsory star value on that subject.
customer_reviews.author: Gopher

customer_reviews.title: Super little machine
customer_reviews.text: After using a large machine for some years until it finally packed in I was not sure what to buy in replacement. I am extremely pleased that we choose this one. It is a compact machine that does exactly what it says it will. It makes good pot of coffee which stay nice and hot for 40 minutes. After that time the coffee stews anyway so that is sufficient for us. I would thoroughly recommend this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Mason

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: With the irrigation style design the coffee is all filtered to give maximum strength. Use good quality coffee as well, which is worth searching for. Low price for item makes it worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon White

customer_reviews.title: Defective pot and leaky
customer_reviews.text: I bought this coffee maker because it was a best seller, but the pot was defective and also leaked. Not the best purchase. I ended up spending a lot more and purchased an all in one Breville Coffee maker that works amazingly!
customer_reviews.author: Agnes T.

customer_reviews.title: Quick filter coffee
customer_reviews.text: Use machine for breakfast coffee every morning. Simple to use, keeps brewed coffee warm for reasonable time. Only disadvantage is that paper filters are needed if coffee is finely ground.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth John Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: Totally Duff
customer_reviews.text: It has stopped working already and it is only a couple of months old!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Fast, easy, and reliable.
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker is fast, reliable, and wonderful! Never having had a coffee maker before. This machine is easy to use. And made my morning coffee amazing. An addition to my home I don't think I'd cope with out now. Very please.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A.Bracegirdle

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one that we have purchased as after several years and thousands of cups of coffee the first one we had to retire now all is well and the new one is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Simple and quick to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a well designed unit that is simple to use and clean with quick drink production. I keep a selection of ground coffee types available to provide variety of flavour and taste. For freshly grround beans, I use the Mellita Molino. Couldn't be easier.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. S.

customer_reviews.title: excellent coffee
customer_reviews.text: A more up to date replica of my previous machine, equally as good at making coffee but so much quicker than my old one. Very pleased indeed with its replacement. Recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: great so far. there was a trial and error period of how much water i should put in for a regular sized mug, i now fill it with water up to the marks between 2 and 4 (3 and 6 for espresso). i was worried when i read the reviews about the top lid melting but mine functions normally
customer_reviews.author: amunt

customer_reviews.title: Based on one cup.
customer_reviews.text: This is based off the one cup of coffee I gave made in this so far, but I'm very impressed! Coffee is much hotter than my previous machine, even with milk straight from the fridge in it. Machine itself is sturdy and well built with a nice fit is, and while it's a reasonable size it's not absolutely gigantic. Very happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Well Up with the Times
customer_reviews.text: This replaced a machine that needed replacing after 10+ years. I was amazed at how much better it was than the old one in terms of having a timer (not used it yet), for ease of filling with cold water, and for removing parts for thorough washing. And all at much the same price as the old one in real terms.
customer_reviews.author: John Merriman

customer_reviews.title: Beware - our machine developed a leak after 7 months
customer_reviews.text: We've had Russell Hobbs appliances before and found them to be good however, this coffee machine has developed a major leak which means water from the hopper leaks through the internal casing and out through the bottom. I suspect it has got into the electrics so before we turned it off and unplugged it, it could have presented a risk of electrocution/fire. Let's hope their aftercare is good and the machine is replaced ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Back to old faithful .
customer_reviews.text: Fed up of pods and the price they are and when you have company you need proper coffee not what George Cloony is favouring this month proper COFFEE , thank you its everything I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: STEVIE D

customer_reviews.title: Only stays on for 40 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: Not for families who want coffee at different times. This makes decent coffee but the fact that it starts flashing at 30 minutes and switches off after 40 minutes is very tiresome. Unless everyone turns up at much the same time it has to be reheated. I have no idea why they have made the time so short as I have not noticed any deterioration of quality in coffee makers which stay on for much longer.
customer_reviews.author: sylvia
